name: Black Hole in One (MikiSaxo)
description:
Description : 

Black Hole In One is a game made in 3 weeks with a team of 6 !

The goal was to discover the physics of Unity

Crédits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer and Lead of the project

- Vandeweghe Louise, Game Artist 

- Detollenaere Tristan, Game Artist 

- Gontier Luc, Game Designer

- Hodé Sacha, Game Designer

- Caille Jean-Charles, Game Designer

Thanks to our teachers Esteves Aurélien and Reynaert Vincent to help us during the project !

How to Play :

You just need to use your left mouse button to play

The game doesn't have backup so when you leave, you lose your progression
